SELECT a.petSeq, a.petType, a.petVarieties, a.petGender, a.petName, a.petNickname, a.petBirth, a.petWeight, a.petVaccinationFlag, a.petNeuteringFlag, a.petRegDate, a.petModDate, b.userSeq, b.userName, (SELECT count(*) FROM personality WHERE 1=1 AND pet_petSeq = a.petSeq) AS personalCount, (SELECT count(*) FROM disease WHERE 1=1 AND pet_petSeq = a.petSeq) AS diseaseCount
ORDER BY petSeq DESC limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}

SELECT a.petSeq, a.petVarieties, a.petGender, a.petName, a.petNickname, a.petBirth, a.petWeight, a.petVaccinationFlag, a.petNeuteringFlag, a.petRegDate, a.petModDate, b.userSeq, b.userName, (SELECT count(*) FROM personality WHERE 1=1 AND pet_petSeq = a.petSeq) AS personalCount, (SELECT count(*) FROM disease WHERE 1=1 AND pet_petSeq = a.petSeq) AS diseaseCount FROM pet a LEFT JOIN user b ON a.user_userSeq = b.userSeq WHERE 1=1 AND user_userSeq = #{userSeq} ORDER BY petSeq DESC limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pet WHERE 1=1 AND user_userSeq = #{userSeq}
SELECT petSeq, petVarieties, petGender, petName, petNickname, petBirth, petWeight, petVaccinationFlag, petNeuteringFlag, petDelFlag FROM pet WHERE 1=1 AND petSeq = #{petSeq}
SELECT b.persDiscription FROM pet a LEFT JOIN personality b ON a.petSeq = b.pet_petSeq WHERE 1=1 AND pet_petSeq = #{petSeq}
SELECT b.diseDiscription FROM pet a LEFT JOIN disease b ON a.petSeq = b.pet_petSeq WHERE 1=1 AND pet_petSeq = #{petSeq}
SELECT petSeq, petVarieties, petGender, petName, petNickname, petBirth, petWeight, petVaccinationFlag, petNeuteringFlag FROM pet WHERE 1=1 AND user_userSeq = #{userSeq}

SELECT last_insert_id()
